```

Dependencies:
  publish.yml requires:
    â€¢ All 4 GitHub secrets
    â€¢ Valid manifest.json
    â€¢ Working build process
    â€¢ Passing tests

    â€¢ Valid package.json
```

## Quick Reference Commands

```bash
# Version Management
./scripts/bump-version.sh patch   # Bug fix (1.0.0 â†’ 1.0.1)
./scripts/bump-version.sh minor   # New feature (1.0.0 â†’ 1.1.0)
./scripts/bump-version.sh major   # Breaking change (1.0.0 â†’ 2.0.0)

# Validation
npm run version:check              # Check version consistency

# Building
npm run build                      # Build extension
npm run package                    # Build + create ZIP

# Publishing
git tag vX.Y.Z                     # Create version tag
git push origin vX.Y.Z             # Trigger publish workflow

# Monitoring
# GitHub â†’ Actions â†’ Workflow runs
```
